description.displayText:
Tyronah is an excellent caregiver!  She is very sweet, caring and a wonderful companion. She helps me to shower and dress, anticipating all of my needs. She makes sure that the bathroom and water are warm and helps me in every way possible. 
Tyronah even picks up food for me, does light housekeeping and will do anything else that is needed.  
She is always on time and has been unbelievably helpful.  She has been a lifesaver for me and I could not recommend her more highly. You will be lucky to have her. 
Cathy
